Text: please, seed when you finish it. thank you
Thank you so much for this! I have just ordered it on Amazon (JE Gardiner version), but this looks like it will do just the trick. Many thanks!

Let me know what you think.  I will soon upload other Minkowski works.  
if you are interested in other Gardiner's performances, i have uploaded recently Handel's Messiah by him.

Thanks for sharing this! Minkowski's work is great and the ensemble of singers he gathers together is just awesome. 
So there's more, you say ? :D

Yes.  Watch out for Il trionfo del Tempo e del Disinganno by Handel, cond. Minkowski.
:-)
Thank you. I love this work. The other only copy I have of this is on LP!
I'll be interested to see how this compares with the Gardiner version, which I've enjoyed immensely since it appeared ~20 years ago...
